```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: "asis"

# list of posts
root <- rprojroot::find_root(rprojroot::has_file("_targets.R"))
post_dir <- fs::path(root, "post")
post <- post_dir |>
  fs::dir_ls(
    recurse = TRUE,
    regexp = "[.][rR]?md$"
  ) |> 
  fs::path_rel(post_dir) |> 
  fs::path_ext_remove() |> 
  fs::path_ext_set(".html") |> 
  setdiff("index.html")

purrr::walk(
  rev(post), 
  \(p) {
    t <- p |> 
      fs::path_dir() |> 
      fs::path_split() |> 
      unlist() |> 
      paste(collapse = " / ")
    l <- paste0("[", t, "](", p, ")")
    cat("-", l, "\n")
  }
)
```
